meta.job_title: Persistent Cyber Training Environment Support Technician

duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage range engineering training and tracking system resource utilization for the Persistent Cyber Training Environment (PCTE).
Collect PCTE technical requirements and advocate for those requirements in appropriate PCTE governance activities.
Interface directly with client leadership as a trusted advisor providing key insights into the state of cyber training across the command.
Leverage consulting expertise and technical acumen to help shape the state of training for the client.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Cybersecurity, or Information Systems (Certified Range Engineer – Basic (CRE-B) Certification and DoD 8140/8570 IAT II Certification preferred)
